Group
Types
GROUP_TYPE

Must include: Group\Group.hpp

GROUP_TYPE_IDLE

Group which is doing nothing specific at the location now. Probably a reserve non-structured infantry squad or a vehicle without assigned crew.

GROUP_TYPE_VEH_STATIC

Static vehicle(s) and its/their crew

GROUP_TYPE_VEH_NON_STATIC

Non-static vehicles and their crew

GROUP_TYPEBUILDING_SENTRY

Infantry inside buildings in firing positions like snipers/marksmen/sharpshooters

GROUP_TYPE_PATROL

Patrols that are walking around

Functions
new

Parameters: _side, _groupType,

_side

Side (west, east, etc) of this group

_groupType

Number, group type, see GROUP_TYPE

Returns: nil

delete

NYI

addUnit

Adds an existing Unit to this group. You don't need to call it manually.

Warning: must be called in scheduled environment! Probably needs a fix :/

Access: internal use!

Parameters: _unit

_unit to add

Returns: nil

removeUnit

Removes a unit from this group.

Access: internal use

Parameters: _unit

_unit

Unit that will be removed from this group.

Returns: nil

getUnits

Returns an array with units in this group.

Returns: Array of units.

getType

Description

Returns: Number, grup type. See GROUP_TYPE,

getGroupHandle

Returns a valid group handle of this group. Creates a group with createGroup if it wasn't created yet.

Returns: group handle.

setGarrison

Sets the Garrison of this garrison.  Use Garrison.addGroup to add a group to a garrison.

Access: internal use.

Parameters: _garrison

_garrison

Garrison

Returns: nil

getGarrison

Returns the Garrison this Group is attached to.

Returns: String, Garrison

getAI

Returns the AI of this group, if it's spawned, or "" otherwise.

Returns: String, <AIGroup>

handleUnitKilled

NYI

Returns: nil

handleUnitDespawned

NYI

Returns: nil

handleUnitSpawned

NYI

Returns: nil

createAI

Creates an <AIGroup> for this group.

Access: internal.

Returns: nil

spawn

Spawns all the units in this group.

Parameters: _loc

_loc

Location where the group will spawn.

Returns: nil

despawn

Despawns all units in this group. Also deletes the group handle.

Returns: nil

getSubagents

Returns subagents of this agent.  For group subagents are its units, since their <AIUnit> is processed synchronosuly with <AIGroup> by default.

Access: Used by AI class

Returns: array of units.

getPossibleGoals

Returns the list of goals this agent evaluates on its own.

Access: Used by AI class

Returns: Array with goal class names

getPossibleActions

Returns the list of actions this agent can use for planning.

Access: Used by AI class

Returns: Array with action class names

serialize

See MessageReceiver.serialize

deserialize

See MessageReceiver.deserialize

transferOwnership

See MessageReceiver.transferOwnership

createUnitsFromTemplate

Creates units from template and adds them to this group.

Parameters: _template, _subcatID

_template

<Template>

_subcatID

subcategory of this group template

Returns: Number, amount of created units.
